ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: FREQUENCY SCORE: At the time in your life when you were drinking the most alcohol, were you drinking it:
Notes: 0= Never; 1= A few times a year, on special occasions; 2= Once a week or less; 3= Every weekend, or most weekends and holidays; 4= Three or more days a week; 5= Every day, or nearly every day

ElementDescription: When was this?
Notes: MM/DD/YY or YYYY

ElementDescription: Are you drinking currently?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: DURATION SCORE: How long did this pattern of drinking last?
Notes: 0= If Frequency Score is 0, 1, or 2; 1= Less than six months; 2= Six months to one year; 3= More than a year

ElementDescription: AMOUNT SCORE: During this time when you were drinking the most, how many drinks at a sitting or in a day would you typically drink?
Notes: 0= None; 1= One-two; 2= Two-three; 3= Four-five; 4= Five-ten; 5= Ten or more

ElementDescription: Is alcohol your drug of choice?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Age of first use (Alcohol):
Notes: Age in Years

ElementDescription: Total Alcohol Score:
Notes: Total= sum of Frequence Score, Duration Score, and Amount Score

ElementDescription: Alcohol Lifetime Section Comments:
FREQUENCY SCORE: During the last 30 days, how many days did you drink alcohol:
Notes: 0= None; 1= One day; 2= Two to three days; 3= Four to five days; 4= Six to fourteen days; 5= Fifteen to thirty days

ElementDescription: DURATION SCORE: How long has this current pattern of drinking been going on?
Notes: 0= No use; 1= Less than six months; 2= Six months to one year; 3= More than a year

ElementDescription: AMOUNT SCORE: During the last month, when you were drinking the most, how many drinks at a sitting or in a day would you typically drink?
Notes: 0= None; 1= One-two; 2= Two-three; 3= Four-five; 4= Five-ten; 5= Ten or more

ElementDescription: Is alcohol your drug of choice?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Total 30-Day Alcohol Score:
Notes: Total= sum of Frequence Score, Duration Score, and Amount Score

ElementDescription: Alcohol 30 Day Section Comments:
FREQUENCY SCORE: At the time in your life when you were smoking the most (a) cigarettes or (b) cigars, were you smoking:
Notes: 0= Never smoked; 1= Fewer than 20 times in lifetime; 2= 20 to 100 times in lifetime; 3= Once a day, every day or most days; 4= In clusters, at specific times of day like coffee breaks or lunchtime, every day or most days; 5= At regular intervals throughout the day, every day or most days

ElementDescription: When was this?
Notes: MM/DD/YY or YYYY

ElementDescription: Are you smoking currently?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: DURATION SCORE: How long did this pattern of smoking last?
Notes: 0= If Frequency Score is 0, 1, or 2; 1= Less than six months; 2= Six months to one year; 3= More than a year

ElementDescription: AMOUNT SCORE: How many packs per day of cigarettes would you typically smoke, at your heaviest use?
Notes: 0= None; 1= Less than half a pack; 2= Half a pack; 3= One pack; 4= One-two packs; 5= Two or more packs

ElementDescription: How many cigars per day would you typically smoke, at your heaviest use?
Notes: 0 = None; 1= One; 2= One-Two; 3= Two or More

ElementDescription: Is tobacco your drug of choice?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Age of first use (Tobacco):
Notes: Age in Years

ElementDescription: Total Tocacco Score:
Notes: Total= sum of Frequence Score, Duration Score, and Amount Score

ElementDescription: Tocacco Lifetime Section Comments:
FREQUENCY SCORE: During the last 30 days, when you were smoking the most (a) cigarettes or (b) cigars, were you smoking:
Notes: 0= Does not smoke at present; 1= One to 3 days per week; 2= Once a day, every day or most days; 3= In clusters, at specific times of day like coffee breaks or lunchtime, every day or most days; 4= At regular intervals throughout the day, every day or most days

ElementDescription: DURATION SCORE: How long has this pattern of smoking been going on?
Notes: 0= No use; 1= Less than six months; 2= Six months to one year; 3= More than a year

ElementDescription: AMOUNT SCORE: During the past 30 days, How many packs per day of cigarettes would you typically smoke, at your heaviest use?
Notes: 0= None; 1= Less than half a pack; 2= Half a pack; 3= One pack; 4= One-two packs; 5= Two or more packs

ElementDescription: How many cigars per day would you typically smoke, during the past month?
Notes: 0 = None; 1= One; 2= One-Two; 3= Two or More

ElementDescription: Is tobacco your drug of choice?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Total 30-Day Tocacco Score:
Notes: Total= sum of Frequence Score, Duration Score, and Amount Score

ElementDescription: Tocacco 30 Day Section Comments:
FREQUENCY SCORE: At the time in your life when you were using the most cocaine or crack cocaine, were you using it:
Notes: 0= Never used; 1= Fewer than 20 times in lifetime; 2= 20 to 100 times in lifetime; 3= More than 100 times in lifetime; 4= Once a day, every day or most days; 5= Three or more times a day, one to three days a week; 6= Three or more times a day, three to five days a week; 7= Several times a day, every day or most days, or continuous use as long as drug is available

ElementDescription: How did you use it?
Notes: 1= smoking; 2= snorting; 3= freebasing; 4= skin popping; 5= IV injection

ElementDescription: When was this?
Notes: MM/DD/YY or YYYY

ElementDescription: Are you currently using?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: DURATION SCORE: How long did this pattern of cocaine use last?
Notes: 0= If Frequency Score is 0, 1, or 2; 1= Less than six months; 2= Six months to one year; 3= More than a year

ElementDescription: Number of grams: During this time when you were using the most cocaine, how much would you use/spend at one sitting?
Notes: Number of grams and then Multiply by $80

ElementDescription: Number of vials or rocks: During this time when you were using the most cocaine, how much would you use/spend at one sitting?
Notes: Number of vials or rocks and then Multiply by $10

ElementDescription: Amount of money spent per day on cocaine: During this time when you were using the most cocaine, how much would you use/spend at one sitting?
Notes: Total sum of questions coke_lifetime5a and coke_lifetime5b

ElementDescription: AMOUNT SCORE: (based on coke_lifetime5c)
Is cocaine your drug of choice?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

Notes: Age in Years

ElementDescription: Total Cocaine Score:
Notes: Total= sum of Frequence Score, Duration Score, and Amount Score
